word: G5142 - τρέφω - tréphō - tref'-o - Bring up

sections.paragraph: ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primary verb (properly θρέφω threphō; but perhaps strengthened from the base of G5157 through the idea of convolution); properly to stiffen, that is, fatten (by implication to cherish [with food, etc.], pamper, rear): - bring up, feed, nourish.
